item.description:
Hey Folks!

I've come out of my cave (i.e. desk at work) and would like to host a Happy Hour at Orleans Restaurant. This is a chance for the Cambridge and Somerville people to have a short hike after-work and an opportunity for Boston people to visit us 'Red-liners' on the other side of the River.

http://orleansrestaur...

Orleans is a great lounge and restaurant in Davis Square for drink, foods and even watching sports without the 'sports bar' feel. I also saw on the website that they host a Trivia Night on Weds. If it's true, all you trivia buffs...get ready!

Make sure to babysit and pay for your own tab while you're partying. No group tabs are happening here.

Adrienne
item.how_to_find_us: I'm copying Erin....I'll have on my multi-colored scarf (hot-pink and magenta) and green headband.
item.why: A chance for the group to check out a great bar in Davis Square and get acquainted with the other side of the river.
item.name: Davis Square Happy Hour! - Orleans Restaurant
